text: “Soni tulembelani yambone pa duniya pano ni ku Akhera kwakwe, chisimu uwwe tuwujiile Kukwenu.” (Allah) jwatite: “Ilagasyo Yangu chinansausye nayo jwangunsaka (mwa ŵandu ŵakusakala), sano chanasa Changu ni chin'jeeneele chindu chilichose (pa duniya), nambo (ku Akhera) chinjalembela chalakwe (chanasacho) kuti chikaapate aŵala ŵali ni woga (wakun'jogopa Allah) ni akutolaga Zaka, kwisa soni aŵala ŵaakuŵa ali nkugakulupilila ma Ȃya Getu.”
